api_list.name: Verify your user identity
api_list.description: Will verify user identity through their id number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://id-verification-service.p.rapidapi.com/api/dni/13476084"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "id-verification-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://id-verification-service.p.rapidapi.com/api/dni/{id_number}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "id-verification-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
